title: Design Starter Pack
tagline: Two handy decks we reach for all the time.
description: These used to be pinned on the homepage. Now they live together so you can open the decks, duplicate them, or copy the link whenever you need.

decks.title: Brand and Visual Presentation
decks.summary: Workshop deck that walks through building a visual narrative, including prompts we use live in class.

decks.title: Free Design Resources
decks.summary: Curated toolbox full of mockups, color pickers, font libraries, and inspiration boards. Great as a launchpad for assignments.
